name: Carsick Carventure
description:
You are about to play a student game made by a small but ambitious team. Releasing our first game on Steam is a dream come true! The game is crafted under the guidance of the developer of the Engine Evolution franchise, and we can't wait until you try it!


In this Chrome Dinosaur inspired mode, you take a looong ride through an endless world as you dodge a wide range of foes and pull off epic flips to dominate the leaderboards. Do you have what it takes to set the all-time high score?


Buckle up for a ride in stylish procedurally generated worlds. We went the extra mile and took a special course at the university to learn how to make them!


The game was created by Vladimír Hořký (MFF UK), Jan Nekarda (MFF UK), Sára Borovičková (PedF UK). Published by Petr Šimůnek (MFF UK)
